thread.title: Oscars 2017: The Full List of Winners (PHOTOS)
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: The Full List of Winners (PHOTOS)

author: Samantha Lear
title: Oscars 2017: The Full List of Winners (PHOTOS)
text:
NEXT Advertisement 
Can you believe it’s already time for Oscars 2017 ?! Time to pick the best of the best in movies this year. 
Will La La Land sweep the categories, as it did with the Golden Globes ? Maybe we’ll have some upsets, thanks to Casey Affleck or Moonlight . 
Keep scrolling to find out who’s taking home the Academy Awards tonight! 
The Oscars 2017 are live on ABC. Check back with Wetpaint for more live coverage.
